pages.text: That's still a simple $(n)semi-auto$() farm for crops that can be destroyed by $(item)Water$() (like $(item)Wheat$(), $(item)Potatoes$(), $(item)Carrots$(),...). $(br2)(The glass is to illustrate the construction) $(br)$(li)Flipping the $(l:redstone/redstone_components#lever)$(item)Lever$() causes the $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Pistons$() to lower, allowing $(item)Water$() to flow down over the fields and flushing the drops into a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#hopper)$(item)Hopper$() to a $(l:useables/chest)$(item)Chest$().
This farm can be expanded infinitely downwards.
